lines.name: Locke
lines.text: This shadowy city. Some think that it’s a quiet sunny paradise, but I’ve roamed these streets long enough to know better.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: The brightest light casts the darkest shadows, and this place is no different. Just out of sight, there’s a hazy world of crime that escapes the law.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It’s not perfect, but it’s home.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And I’m the only one that can drag the criminals into the light. It’s my burden to bear, my-

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Hey Locke! ...Are you talking to yourself again?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: N-no! It was practice! A pep talk!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait, how did you get in here?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I mean your door's unlocked like usual. Anyways, what are you up to?
